author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: First seen earlier this year, Adafruit has officially launched the Fruit Jam, a compact RP2350B-powered development board. The product mentions that it matches the dimensions of a standard credit card, 3.375 by 2.125 inches (ISO/IEC 7810 ID-1), while providing the functionality of a miniature standalone computer. This device  is powered by the RP2350B, a dual-core […]
title: Fruit Jam Mini Computer Features RP2350B, ESP32-C6 WiFi, and DVI Video
